original: Saṅkhārakkhandho na anicco na saṅkhato na paṭiccasamuppanno na khayadhammo na vayadhammo na virāgadhammo na nirodhadhammo na vipariṇāmadhammoti?
analyzed: ▁saṃkhārakkhandh o ▁na ▁anicc o ▁na ▁saṃkh ato ▁na ▁paṭicca sam u ppann o ▁na ▁khay adhammo ▁na ▁vay adhammo ▁na ▁virāg adhammo ▁na ▁nirodh adhammo ▁na ▁vipariṇām adhamm oti

original: nanu saṅkhārakkhandho anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno khayadhammo vayadhammo virāgadhammo nirodhadhammo vipariṇāmadhammoti?
analyzed: ▁nanu ▁saṃkhārakkhandh o ▁anicc o ▁saṃkh ato ▁paṭicca sam u ppann o ▁khay adhammo ▁vay adhammo ▁virāg adhammo ▁nirodh adhammo ▁vipariṇām adhamm oti

original: vipariṇāmadhammo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
“suññamidaṁ, bhikkhave, saṅkhārā attena vā attaniyena vā”ti.
analyzed: ▁ suññ amid aṃ ▁bhikkhave ▁saṃkhārā ▁att ena ▁vā ▁attani y ena ▁vāti
